name: Hungry Fish Evolution
description:
It's hard to live a small fish in a big ocean. Other larger fish are striving to eat it, and even she herself is dying of hunger. But with your help, she can hunt more effectively, learn to avoid other predators and overcome all adversity and difficulties to move to the next stage of evolution, and also improve their skills that help to survive in this dangerous world.
An entertaining arcade with RPG elements and the ability to paint your fish in your favorite colors, which can help relax and relieve tension or experience your reaction and ability to concentrate in a hardcore survival mode!
